data.name: EVE: Valkyrie – Warzone Drifter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Expand your EVE: Valkyrie – Warzone experience with the Drifter Pack.

This pack includes:

  • Epic Drifter 'Arcane' Shadow Ship Paint Job
  • 5x Gold Capsules
  • Epic Drifter 'Flux' Pilot Suit
  • Epic Drifter 'Flux' Pilot Helmet
  • and 14x Forum Avatars

EVE: Valkyrie – Warzone is a first-person spaceship shooter that puts you in the cockpit for fast, fun, intense multiplayer space combat. Hailed as the “killer app” for virtual reality, EVE: Valkyrie now brings the thrill and skill of competitive online space combat to everyone with the massive Warzone expansion.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: i3-550 processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 / AMD 290 or equivalent DX 11 compatible card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supports Xbox One controllers and Xbox 360 controllers on PC. Compatible with HOTAS flight stick controls.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel i7 processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supports Xbox One controllers and Xbox 360 controllers on PC. Compatible with HOTAS flight stick controls.
